oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hartsville during a flood
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This photograph shows the community of Hartsville, Tennessee during a flood that occurred in 1925.

Prior to the development of the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA), many rivers in the Tennessee river valley flooded. The development of TVA's system of dams and reservoirs helped control the river's navigation and provided flood control.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flood Damage
Photographs
